Never replace before receiving the original. If the damage was due to the shipper I always try to get photos of the packaging so a claim can be filed. Examine carefully before you make any decisions about refunding or replacing. Personally I would never replace.

t: Who's at Fault for Damaged Products—and What to Do Next
s: Upon accepting the damaged package, you want to immediately take detailed notes and snap photos of both the compromised packaging and the broken products; this may help to determine whether the package was improperly packed by the seller, or improperly handled and damaged in transit.

t: Damaged Amazon Fresh Items for Refund - Amazon Customer Service
s: Learn how to return your Amazon Fresh product If you receive a damaged or unusable Amazon Fresh grocery item. You can request a refund through the Online Returns center up to 30 day from the date of delivery.
